ygData.msgSnippet: ... Please Ignore the message I posted .. I ve been up 40+ hours when I read this and I read it wrong. I though you were Disputing the fact that he Drops a
ygData.messageBody:
Magis wrote:

> From: Magis <Magis@...>
>
> James Ford wrote:
>
> > From: "James Ford" <smeagol@...>
> >
> > you have to follow the guard around on his whole patrol the card by BB is
> > the first one he drops ... and he doesn't drop the last until he gets back
> > to the guard tower... which he never does without a little help from use
> > friendly PC's due to his incedible wimpyness and burning desire to kill
> > everythig in sight... thus you have to following him around the whole way..
> > killing evrything he attacks and picking up after him...
> >
> > Good luck
> >
> > Aerowynn, the Whistling Wanderer
> >
> >
>
> Are you kidding me .. I was Level 6-7 .. he'd walk up to BB Drop a Card walk
> away .. I got 3-4 like that before i realized there lore ...

Please Ignore the message I posted .. I've been up 40+ hours when I read this and
I read it wrong.

I though you were Disputing the fact that he Drops a card at BB etc. etc. .. all
my imagination ..
--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr
